content: Hi Everyone, Is there a way to represent Logical OR in Search Params ..Ex using using Identifiers: https://localhost:9443/fhir-server/api/v4/Patient?identifier=http://hl7.org/fhir/sid/us-ssn|999-47-7892 OR identifier=http://hospital.smarthealthit.org|2ae7efa3-57aa-4bdb-9054-d436b9e6db3x How do i represent this in Search Parameters Thank you..
